description: Auto-validate SKILL.md files after Write/Edit operations

hooks.command: command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; file="$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty')" && [ -n "$file" ] && echo "$file" | grep -q 'SKILL\.md$' && command -v aigent >/dev/null 2>&1 && aigent validate "$(dirname "$file")" 2>&1 || true
